alert.note: Alert for Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 10:39AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AN PERIOD LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...HOWARD...HARFORD...NORTHWESTERN CECIL AND BALTIMORE COUNTIES AND BALTIMORE CITY... Snow will coat the ground in spots late this morning and temperatures will fall to near freezing while the snow is occurring. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph are expected during this time and visibility will be reduced to around one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Columbia, Pikesville, Cockeysville, Aberdeen, Historic Ellicott City, Ellicott City, Towson, Bel Air South, Catonsville, Woodlawn, Randallstown, Parkville, Owings Mills, Bel Air North, Eldersburg, Carney, Milford Mill, Perry Hall, and Reisterstown. This includes the following highways... Route 1 in Maryland between mile markers 8 and 4. Interstate 70 in Maryland between mile markers 75 and 93. Interstate 95 in Maryland between mile markers 50 and 51, and between mile markers 61 and 77. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when traveling. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination.

area.areaDesc: Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
